review: Its nice but wireless signal is a bit weak! Bought it as a gift for my parents and their bedroom was upstairs directly above the room with internet modem, and it would not connect at all. Luckily I already owned a Roku device which worked just fine, but I am still on the fence about it. Overall its beautifully designed, and as weird as it sounds I love the high definition screen savers!

review: I deal with a lot of tech, software, etc. I was given this for Christmas. I had somewhat of a skeptical view of it as we already had Netflix and other options and wasn't sure how it would fit in everything. I was surprised how easy it was to setup and use. I use it routinely now and I have found the navigation to be simple and the interface rather handy. The best part of course it is already tied to my Amazon Prime account and there was a surprising amount of free content as well as a good selection of content to rent or purchase.
